message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.NE 

The paper discusses a sub-field of machine learning called continual learning, which is related to topics such as multi-task learning, concept drift, and regularization. Based on these keywords, the most likely arXiv CS sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning), followed by cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), cs.CV (Computer Vision), cs.CL (Computation and Language), and cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing).
